title: Sprout Lifestyle Cafe - Shaanxi
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Another branch of Sprout, with store on the first floor, cafe and cooking studio on the second floor. Focus is on whole foods, plant based, and mostly veg. Has salads, nut milks, smoothies, raw desserts.
